name: Project Open Hand
description: Project Open Hand provides medically tailored meals and groceries to people living with serious illnesses, as well as nutritious meals to seniors. Since 1985, they've served millions of meals with love.
fullDescription: Project Open Hand provides medically tailored meals and groceries to people living with serious illnesses, as well as nutritious meals to seniors. Since 1985, they've served millions of meals with love.
whatTheyOffer:
- Medically tailored meals for people with critical illnesses
- Nutrition counseling from registered dietitians
- Home delivery available
- Congregate meal programs for seniors
- Grocery bags and wellness checks
- Services available regardless of income
howToGetIt: Call or apply online. Programs available for people with HIV/AIDS, cancer, diabetes, kidney disease, and other serious illnesses. Senior congregate meals available at community sites. Referrals from healthcare providers welcome.
keywords: Project Open Hand, medically tailored meals, HIV, AIDS, cancer, diabetes, kidney disease, senior meals, nutrition counseling, home delivery
